name: agentops-marketplace
description: AgentOps plugins for AI-assisted development workflows

plugins.name: general-kit
plugins.description: Portable Claude Code skills - no external dependencies. Research, validation, documentation, and expert agents.

plugins.name: agentops
plugins.description: Complete AgentOps toolkit with domain skills for languages, development, operations, and more

plugins.name: vibe-kit
plugins.description: Validation and quality assurance - vibe checks, bug hunting, complexity analysis

plugins.name: pr-kit
plugins.description: Open source contribution workflow - research, plan, implement, validate, and learn from PRs

plugins.name: beads-kit
plugins.description: Git-based issue tracking with beads CLI - create, track, and manage issues

plugins.name: core-kit
plugins.description: Core workflow skills - research, plan, implement, crank, and iterate

plugins.name: dispatch-kit
plugins.description: Work assignment and orchestration - handoff, mail, roles, and crew management

plugins.name: docs-kit
plugins.description: Documentation generation and scaffolding - code-map, OSS docs, doc creator

plugins.name: domain-kit
plugins.description: Reference knowledge across domains - languages, development, operations, security, and more

plugins.name: gastown-kit
plugins.description: Gas Town multi-agent orchestration - crew, polecats, routing, and polecat lifecycle
